mapper.select: select p.poId,p.dPlanId,p.poQuantity,p.poPracticalQuantity,e.empName as poProposerName,p.poData, p.poState,p.poMaterialState,p.poStatus from productionOrder p join main_employee e on p.poProposerId=e.empId where p.poId>=3000 and p.poVisibles=1
select p.proId,m.proName,p.podsQuantity,p.podsPracticalQuantity from productionOrderDetails p join main_product m on p.proId=m.proId where poId=#{poId}
mapper.update: update productionOrder set poVisibles=0 where poId=#{poId}
update productionOrder set poStatus ='已审核',poAuditorName=#{poAuditorName}, poAuditingDate=#{poAuditingDate}, poplanDetailDes=#{poplanDetailDes} where poId=#{poId}
mapper.select: select pd.proId,pd.podsQuantity*mrd.realityDosage/1000 as Weight,rm.rawMaterialId from productionOrderDetails pd join main_recipe mr on mr.proId=pd.proId join main_recipedetail mrd on mrd.recipeId=mr.recipeId join main_rawMaterial rm on mrd.rawMaterialId=rm.rawMaterialId where pd.poId=#{poId}
mapper.update: update productionOrder set poMaterialState ='待签收' where poId=#{poId}
update productionOrder set poState='生产中' where poId=#{poId}
mapper.select: select p.podId,m.proId,m.proName,p.podsQuantity,p.podsPracticalQuantity from productionOrderDetails p join main_product m on p.proId=m.proId where poId=#{poId}
mapper.update: update productionOrderDetails set podsPracticalQuantity=0 where poId=#{poId}
update productionQualityDetails set proQuantity=#{podsPracticalQuantity} where pqdId=#{pqdId}
update productionQualityDetails set pqId=#{pqId} where pqId=1
mapper.select: select sum(podsPracticalQuantity) as podsPracticalQuantity from productionOrderDetails where poId=#{poId}
mapper.update: update mplanDetails set mDetailsSurplus=mDetailsSurplus+#{number} where proId=#{proId}
update productionOrder set poState='生产结束' where poId=#{poId}
